pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.2: That is, four fingerbreadths. For a discussion of the aṅgula, see sugata in Appendix of Technical Terms.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc92:1.3: Here I render sugata as “Buddha”, which seems required by the narrative. I do not think, however, that this narrative usage determines the interpretation of sugata when used in a technical sense in connection with measures, for which I prefer the rendering “standard”, see word analysis below. For a full discussion of sugata, see the Appendix of Technical Terms.
